DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Mediclore®, as an antiadhesive barrier, which is made of Poloxamer, Gelatin and Chitosan.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Anti-adhesive Effect and Safety of a Mixed Solid of Poloxamer, Gelatin and Chitosan(Mediclore®)
DOC.criteria: Patients with Gynecological disease (benign disease) Patients who Written informed consent Patients without clinically significant lab having enrolled another clinical trials within 1 month Immunosuppression or autoimmune disease Anticoagulant, general steroids within a week from surgery Serious diseases (heart failure, renal failure, liver failure, uncontrolled hypertension, diabetes mellitus, coagulation deficiencies) Patients with previous history of surgery at the same operate site
